"from west to east with the gate courtyard to the north"

"The imposing height of the city wall towers farther ahead to the north, making the palace wall and abbey seem small in comparison as they flank the gate courtyard beyond. The limestone wall of the consulate building to the south creates an additional boundary that makes the road seem even narrower in contrast."
